articles.title: Kim Jong Il Inspects KPA Navy Unit
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Inspects KPA Navy Unit
 Pyongyang, November 27 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il inspected the Command of KPA Navy Combined Unit 587.
					After receiving a salute, he went round the monument to President Kim Il Sung's on-site guidance and the room devoted to the history of the combined unit.
					
					Noting that the combined unit has a long tradition of struggle as it has demonstrated the might of the KPA by fully displaying popular heroism in the defence of the country and socialist construction over the last more than six decades, he highly appreciated its feats.
					
					He watched combat and technical equipment and training of seamen to learn in detail about the implementation of the training program for this year and the preparations for training next year.
					
					He expressed great satisfaction over the fact that the unit has successfully trained all the commanding officers and soldiers to be a-match-for-a hundred fighters possessed of high combat technique and capability by intensifying the combat and political training true to the WPK's policy of training. He highly appreciated the successes made by the unit in the training this year.
					
					The seamen of the KPA have grown to be indomitable fighters who enshrine as their unshakable faith the spirit of devotedly defending the leader, the spirit of readily becoming human bullets and bombs and the spirit of blasting oneself, he said, adding: Our socialist country is impregnable as these invincible ranks have reliably defended its seas. 
					
					Saying that the navy is of important significance in the DPRK as it is seabound on three sides, he set forth important tasks which would serve as guidelines for further bolstering up the naval armed force.
					
					Then he went round entertainment and educational facilities including a library and an education room to acquaint himself with the ideological education of seamen.
					
					He looked round a bedroom, a mess hall and a non-staple food store and other supply service facilities to take deep care of seamen's living.
					
					Walking in the compound of the barracks, he learned about the management of the unit. He praised the unit for having kept the exterior and interior of its barracks neat and tidy and created a wonderful environment around them. 
					
					He had a photo session with the servicepersons of the unit.
					
					He was accompanied by Vice Marshal of the KPA Kim Yong Chun, vice-chairman of the NDC of the DPRK and minister of the People's Armed forces, KPA General Kim Jong Gak, member of the NDC of the DPRK and first vice-department director of the KPA General Political Bureau, KPA General Ri Yong Ho, chief of the KPA General Staff, and KPA Generals Hyon Chol Hae and Ri Myong Su.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets Mauritanian President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Mauritanian President
 Pyongyang, November 27 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Friday sent a message of greetings to Mohamed Ould Abdel Aziz, President of Mauritania, on the occasion of the 49th anniversary of its independence.
					 Expressing the belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger, Kim in the message wished the president and people of Mauritania success in their work for the stability and prosperity of the country.

articles.title: U.S. Organization Confirms DPRK as Nuclear State
articles.content:
U.S. Organization Confirms DPRK as Nuclear State
 Pyongyang, November 27 (KCNA) -- The U.S. Nuclear Scientists Association confirmed the DPRK as a nuclear weapons state.
					 The November issue of the magazine published by the association said that nine countries of the world including the DPRK have had access to nuclear weapons.
					
					 It was reported by Reuters on Nov. 20.

articles.title: AFC Pro Coaching Course
articles.content:
AFC Pro Coaching Course
 Pyongyang, November 27 (KCNA) -- An AFC pro-diploma coaching course was held at
					 Kim Il Sung Stadium in Pyongyang from November 2 to 22.
					 It was given by UK and German lecturers.
					
					 Participating in the course were those with A-class coach qualification of the AFC, sports masters and coaches of the national selection.
					
					 The course dealt with different issues including the training for physical development of footballers.

articles.title: DPRK Speed-skaters Prove Successful
articles.content:
DPRK Speed-skaters Prove Successful
 Pyongyang, November 27 (KCNA) -- The DPRK gained five gold medals, six silver medals and four bronze medals at the International Short Track Speed-skating Race for Danubia Cup held in Poland from Nov. 20 to 22.
					 Kim Chol Song and Kim Ryong Chol came first in men's 1000m and 1500m events and Kim Jong Mi in women's 500m event while the DPRK took the first place in the women's 3000m relay race.
					
					 Kim Chol Song placed first and Kim Ryong Chol and Kim Jong Mi second in men's and women's all-round individual.
					
					 DPRK players took the second place in men's 5000m relay race, men's 500m and 1500m events and women's 1000m event.
					
					 They also came third in men's 1000m, 1500m and 500m events and women's 1500m event.

articles.title: "Album of Plants in Area of Paektusan Secret Camp"
articles.content:
"Album of Plants in Area of Paektusan Secret Camp"
 Pyongyang, November 27 (KCNA) -- The book "Album of Plants in Area of Paektusan Secret Camp" has been recently published in the DPRK.
					 The book carries more than 60 photos of plants growing in the area of the Paektusan secret camp including Jong Il Peak, Mt. Sobaek and Saja Peak.
					
					 It also includes photos of newly-found useful plants in the genus of Rhodiola elongate, pine-nut tree which has been known as one growing in areas below 1,600 metres above the sea level and other newly-found plants, plants in danger of extinction and rare plants and useful plants of great significance vegetating in the area.
					
					 The data of the book are some of the landscape ecological data collected by teachers and researchers of the Life Science Faculty of Kim Il Sung University in the course of evaluating the bio-diversity and carrying on researches into protecting and proliferating useful fauna and flora in the Mt. Paektu area in the period from Juche 91 (2002) to Juche 97 (2008).
					
					 The book will help readers get better knowledge of plants flourishing in the area of the Paektusan secret camp and protect and manage them well.

articles.title: Pyongyang Embroidery Institute
articles.content:
Pyongyang Embroidery Institute
Pyongyang, November 27 (KCNA) -- "Korean embroidery is beautiful. More beautiful are the Korean women." This is a passage of the visitor's book of the Pyongyang Embroidery Institute, which was written by a foreigner. The institute is sited on the bank of the River Pothong.
					Visitors can see pretty girls with a hairdo of single-pigtail in Korean chima (skirt) and jogori (coat) working at the trial embroidery creation room of the institute.
					
					They, embroidering the superb view of Mt. Chilbo needle by needle, give visitors an impression of seeing fairies from the heaven.
					
					They have created lots of embroidery works of national treasure which are unique in content and form. Among them are "Kimilsungia," "Kimjongilia," "Azalea," "Lake Samji in Autumn," "Myriad-Shaped Peaks of Mt. Kumgang," "Stream Sobaek in Morning" and "Evening Glow over Kangson."
					
					A large-sized embroidery work created on the basis of the "Picture of Peasants' Life" by Kim Hong Do, a renowned artist in the 18th century, has been highly appreciated for a vivid depiction of it by the application of various embroidery techniques, which gives an effect of solidity.
					
					Many embroidery works of figures, landscape, animals and others produced by the institute are popular among Korean and foreign visitors and buyers for their fresh and unique depiction.
					
					Most of its employees are women.
					
					Its building is a Korean-style one with hip-saddle tiled roof. It has rooms for drawing, production preparation, creation of trial machine embroidery and so on.
					
					The institute takes orders for embroidery works, too.

articles.title: Scenery of Inner Chilbo
articles.content:
Scenery of Inner Chilbo
Pyongyang, November 27 (KCNA) -- Mt. Chilbo is one of the six beautiful mountains in Korea. There is in the mountain Naegyong Pavilion from which people have enjoyed the inner scenery of Mt. Chilbo from olden times. 
					From Naegyong Pavilion, people can get a view of the whole scenery of Inner Chilbo of Mt. Chilbo, which is grandiose and fascinating for its many peaks and large and small curious rocks.
					
					There are many scenic spots. Among them are the Jung rock which is said that a Buddhist monk turned into a rock, charmed by the beauty of the Ison rock while chanting prayers in a standing position, Kwangdae rock resembling a farmer dancing with a bamboo hat on his head, Changgom (spear and sword) rock, Pubu (a couple) rock associated with different legends, Kumgang Peak, Kumgang cave, Phiano (piano) rock, Chogajip (thatched house) rock, Nongbu (peasant) rock and Kumgang falls.
					
					The water of Kumgang falls falling from a steep cliff looks like silk fabrics and its drips remind people of hundreds of thousands of beads when the water touches the ground.
					
					Jonggak (bell-house) Peak, Kumsu Peak with rocks resembling various animals, Hogu rock similar to a tiger with its mouth opened and Hwaebul (flaming torch) rock and other peaks and curious rocks and Kidang falls which exposes its shape in the flood season are adding beauty to Inner Chilbo of Mt. Chilbo.

articles.title: DPRK Important Days Observed in Mexico
articles.content:
DPRK Important Days Observed in Mexico
Pyongyang, November 27 (KCNA) -- A function took place in Mexico on Nov. 21 on the occasions of the 18th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's assumption of the supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army and the 92nd birth anniversary of Kim Jong Suk, anti-Japanese heroine.
					 Attending it were personages of political parties, organizations and institutions including the Institutional Revolutionary Party and the Democratic Revolutionary Party of Mexico, the Mexico-Korea Friendship Association and the Nezauacoyotl city office and masses.
					
					 Present there on invitation were the DPRK ambassador to Mexico and staff members of his embassy there. 
					
					 The mayor of Nezauacoyotl and other speakers praised Kim Jong Il for having led the just cause of the Korean people under the uplifted banner of independence.
					
					 They stressed that the Korean people would surely emerge victorious in the cause of building a great prosperous and powerful nation, true to the Songun politics of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 They highly lauded the immortal life and noble exploits of Kim Jong Suk who made a great contribution to accomplishing the Juche-oriented Songun revolutionary cause.
					
					 A performance was given by artistes at the function.

articles.title: Anniversary of Intl Kothongryon Marked in Uzbek
articles.content:
Anniversary of Intl Kothongryon Marked in Uzbek
 Pyongyang, November 27 (KCNA) -- Koreans in Uzbekistan held a meeting at the House of the Tashkent Regional Cultural Department on Nov. 22 to mark the 20th anniversary of the formation of the International United Confederation of Koreans (International Kothongryon).
					 Present there were Sok Myong Son, chairman of the confederation, Jo Yun Hae, chairman of the Commonwealth of Independent States Regional Headquarters for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration, other officials and compatriots.
					
					 Present on invitation were the DPRK ambassador to Uzbekistan and his embassy officials and officials of the Tashkent Regional Cultural Department.
					
					 Speakers noted at the meeting that over the past 20 years since its formation in Uzbekistan the International Kothongryon has dynamically conducted the patriotic movement for reunification, expanding its organization in regions densely populated with compatriots including Russia, Kyrgyzstan and other countries belonging to the Commonwealth of Independent States.
					
					 They said that the Koreans in Uzbekistan, too, have fully supported the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration and waged the vigorous struggle to implement them while striving to preserve and develop the nation's culture, traditions and customs with better understanding of their homeland.
					
					 They stressed that all officials and compatriots and younger generations should make positive contribution to the national reunification and the prosperity and development of the nation.
					
					 Then, an art performance was given by compatriot artistes.
					
					 Meanwhile, a commemorative event took place in Soldatsky City, Tashkent Region, on Nov. 23.

articles.title: General Meeting of ITF
articles.content:
General Meeting of ITF
 Pyongyang, November 27 (KCNA) -- The 19th general meeting of the International Taekwon-Do Federation was held in Russia on October 13.
					 It was attended by members of the leadership of the ITF, at least 260 delegates from 86 countries and honorary guests.
					
					 After congratulatory speeches were made the meeting discussed and decided on a series of issues arising in developing the ITF. It adopted the statute and regulations of the ITF and the rules on games revised as required by the times. 
					
					 Chang Ung was reelected president of the International Taekwon-Do Federation and the admission of the Azerbaijan Taekwon-Do Association to the ITF was approved at the meeting. 
					
					 The general meeting decided to hold the 17th Taekwon-Do World Championship in Pyongyang in September Juche 100 (2011).

articles.title: Kim Jong Il inspecciona unidad naval
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il inspecciona unidad naval
Pyongyang, 27 de noviembre (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, inspecciono la Comandancia de la unidad combinada 587 de la marina de guerra del EPC.
					Tras recibir el parte de acogida, el Comandante Supremo recorrio el monumento en memoria de la visita de orientacion del Presidente Kim Il Sung y la sala de presentacion del historial.
					
					Destacando que la unidad combinada es el destacamento de larga tradicion de lucha que puso de pleno manifiesto el gallardo aspecto del EPC al emplear durante mas de 60 anos el heroismo masivo en la defensa de la patria y la construccion socialista, aprecio mucho los meritos de los militares de ella.
					
					Viendo los equipos tecnicos de combate y el ejercicio de los marineros, hizo conocimiento detallado del estado de cumplimiento del programa de entrenamiento de este ano y de los preparativos del mismo para el ano nuevo.
					
					Muy satisfecho de que la unidad haya preparado firmemente a todos los comandantes y soldados como combatientes, dispuestos de gran tecnica y combatividad y capaces del combate de uno vs. ciento, al impulsar intensamente el ejercicio politico y combativo en pleno acato a la orientacion del partido sobre el particular, el Dirigente evaluo altamente los exitos logrados este ano por aquella en el entrenamiento.
					
					Subrayo que nuestros marineros crecieron como combatientes invulnerables, que toman como su inconmovible fe el espiritu de defender al lider a costa de la vida y el de convertirse en bombas y balas.
					
					Anadio que nuestra patria socialista es un bastion inexpugnable gracias a esas filas invencibles que defienden fidedignamente el mar de la patria.
					
					Presento las tareas programaticas que serviran de guia para el fortalecimiento de las fuerzas navales destacando que estas son muy importantes en nuestro pais rodeado por el mar en sus tres lados.
					
					Acto seguido, recorrio la biblioteca, la sala de educacion y otras instalaciones de cultura y educacion averiguando en detalles como marchan la labor ideologica y la educacion sobre los militares.
					
					Estuvo tambien en el dormitorio, el comedor, el deposito de alimentos subsidiaros y otras instalaciones de intendencia donde presto profunda atencion a las condiciones de vida de los marineros.
					
					Y se informo del estado de administracion de la unidad tomando un paseo por el recinto del cuartel.
					
					Encomio el hecho de que los marineros mantuvieran limpias la parte exterior y la interior del cuartel y hayan acondicionado un magnifico medioambiente.
					
					Por ultimo, se fotografio junto con los militares de la unidad combinada.
					
					Le acompanaron el vicemariscal del EPC Kim Yong Chun, vicepresidente del CDN de la RPDC y ministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares, el general de ejercito del EPC Kim Jong Gak, miembro del CDN de la RPDC y primer subjefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC, el general de ejercito del EPC Ri Yong Ho, jefe del Estado Mayor General del EPC, y los generales de ejercito del EPC, Hyon Chol Hae y Ri Myong Su.

articles.title: Entidad de EE.UU. define a Corea como portadora de armas nucleares
articles.content:
Entidad de EE.UU. define a Corea como portadora de armas nucleares
Pyongyang, 27 de noviembre (ATCC) -- Segun reporto Reuters el dia 20, la Asociacion de Cientificos Nucleares de Estados Unidos definio a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea como portadora de armas nucleares.
					 El numero de noviembre de la revista, que publica dicha asociacion, aclaro que poseen dichos artefactos 9 paises del mundo incluyendo a Corea.

articles.title: Impartido cursillo de calificacion de entrenadores de la AFC
articles.content:
Impartido cursillo de calificacion de entrenadores de la AFC
Pyongyang, 27 de noviembre (ATCC) -- Tuvo lugar del 2 al 22 de este mes en el capitalino Estadio   Kim Il Sung el cursillo de calificacion de los entrenadores de categoria profesional de la Confederacion Asiatica de Futbol (AFC en ingles).
					El cursillo estuvo a cargo de los lectores de Gran Bretana y Alemania.
					
					 A la ocasion asistieron los entrenadores calificados de la clase A de la AFC y los otros con el titulo de maestro en deporte y de la seleccion nacional.
					
					Aqui fueron tratados varios problemas como el entrenamiento para el desarrollo fisico de los futbolistas.

articles.title: RPDC gana 15 medallas en torneo internacional de patinaje
articles.content:
RPDC gana 15 medallas en torneo internacional de patinaje
Pyongyang, 27 de noviembre (ATCC) -- En la Competencia Internacional de Patinaje de Velocidad en la Pista Corta por la Copa Danubia, efectuada del dia 20 al 22 en Polonia, los coreanos obtuvieron 5 medallas de oro, 6 de plata y 4 de bronce. 
					Subieron a lo mas alto del podio Kim Chol Song y Kim Ryong Chol en las pruebas masculinas de mil metros y mil 500 metros, respectivamente, mientras Kim Jong Mi hizo otro tanto en la carrera femenina de 500 metros.
					
					Igual hazana la realizaron las muchachas en la carrera de relevos de 3 mil metros.
					
					Ademas, Kim Chol Song conquisto otra presea dorada al ocupar el primer lugar en la clasificacion general individual, en la cual Kim Ryong Chol y Kim Jong Mi se ubicaron en el segundo puesto en sus respectivos sexos.
					
					Las otras medallas de plata fueron conseguidas en la carrera (m) de relevos de 5 mil metros, las pruebas (m) de 500 y mil 500 metros y en la lid (f) de mil metros.
					
					Completaron el medallero los patinadores que terminaron en el tercer lugar en las carreras (m) de    mil, mil 500 y 500 metros y en la justa (f) de mil 500 metros.
